name: Holiday Haulage
description:
Controls:

Left and right to turn the car left and right respectively

Z to roll cig machine

X to equip power-up 

C to drop power-up

How to play:

Your car will always be moving forward, drive through the city following the landmarks displayed on the map. Collect coins and get powerups from the cigarette machine!

Coins: there are coins scattered about throughout the map, the player can pick them up and use them in the cigarette machine to gain powerups.

How to powerups:

There are two types of powerups: spare tires and a plow. The player is able to equip these powerups to help them through the game!

The plow: When receiving the plow, the player can equip it onto their car if they do not already have a plow. The plow will allow the player to get through snow piles that block the road.

Spare tires: The player is only able to equip the spare tires when they have been slowed by road spikes.

Obstacles:

Snow Piles: They block the road. If the player hits a snow pile, it's game over unless they have a plow, in which case, it's game over for the snow pile!

Road Spikes: they puncture the player's tires, causing the vehicle to move slower. Replace punctured tires with spare tires and regain the vehicle's normal speed.

This game was created as a project for Game Development 1 based on the prompts:

Three things: 

a car with a broken tail light 

a cigarette machine filled with something besides cigarettes 

a mysterious coin
